title: 09/08/21 DPS Hour 1 Outspoken Tom Brady
itunes:title: 09/08/21 DPS Hour 1 Outspoken Tom Brady
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan and the crew start off the show discussing everything from Tom Brady now being a more outspoken version of himself, to New England head coach Bill Belichick as boyfriend material, to one legendary "true story" sports movie that isn't exactly all true.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
